title: MVP Launch: Mobile-responsive polish and testing
description: Ensure excellent mobile experience for subway commute use case - touch interactions, performance, offline capabilities
design:
- Test all key flows on actual iOS devices in mobile Safari
- Optimize touch targets (minimum 44x44px)
- Ensure audio playback works reliably on mobile
- Test offline audio playback for downloaded content
- Verify progress persistence across sessions
- Smooth scrolling and transitions
- Optimize bundle size for faster mobile loading
acceptance_criteria:
- All core features work smoothly on iOS Safari
- Audio playback is reliable on mobile
- Touch interactions feel native
- App loads quickly on mobile networks
- Progress persists correctly across sessions
notes:

- Navigation buttons increased to h-11 (44px) on mobile
- User menu button: w-9 h-9 with min-h-[44px] min-w-[44px]
- Library filter buttons: py-3.5 for 44px height
- Audio player controls: w-11 h-11 (44px)

All interactive elements now meet minimum 44x44px touch target size.

PWA verified:
- Service worker active with Workbox caching
- Manifest configured with proper icons
- Offline support enabled

Bundle size analysis:
- Main: 321KB, React vendor: 138KB, React Query: 42KB
- Total dist: 3.8MB
- Code splitting effective

NEXT STEP: Test on actual iOS device (requires manual testing)
close_reason: Completed mobile optimization: touch targets meet 44px standard, PWA implemented with offline support, bundle optimized. Manual iOS device testing pending.

title: Remove flashcard feature completely
description: Remove the entire flashcard/SRS review system from the codebase to simplify the application and speed up audio course generation by skipping flashcard audio generation.
design:
## Scope

Remove all flashcard-related code, database tables, routes, components, and generation logic from the application.

## Areas to Remove

### Database
- Remove `FlashCard` table and related migrations
- Remove `flashcardsEnabled` feature flag from `FeatureFlags` table
- Remove any flashcard-related fields from other tables

### Backend Routes & Services
- Remove `/api/flashcards/*` routes
- Remove flashcard generation logic from course creation queue
- Remove flashcard audio generation from courseQueue.ts
- Remove furigana service if only used for flashcards
- Remove any SRS scheduling logic

### Frontend Components & Pages
- Remove `ReviewPage.tsx` and related review components
- Remove flashcard-related navigation items
- Remove flashcard feature flag checks
- Remove any SRS/review-related UI components

### Tests
- Remove flashcard-related tests
- Update any tests that reference flashcards

## Benefits

1. Faster audio course generation (skip flashcard audio)
2. Simplified codebase
3. Reduced database complexity
4. Removed unused feature flag
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] FlashCard database table removed
- [ ] flashcardsEnabled feature flag removed
- [ ] All flashcard routes removed from server
- [ ] Flashcard generation removed from course queue
- [ ] ReviewPage and flashcard components removed
- [ ] Navigation updated (no Review link)
- [ ] All flashcard tests removed
- [ ] Audio course generation no longer creates flashcard audio
- [ ] Application builds and runs without errors
- [ ] No references to flashcards remain in codebase
close_reason: Successfully removed all flashcard feature code including UI components, routes, database models, feature flags, and tests. Client builds successfully with no errors.
